archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.3.3a: a) reviewing audit material gathered (e.g. to help determine the current state of business applications and supporting technical infrastructure, and how they are deployed and used)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
